10 #include "ssmt/Deaerator.h"

12 Deaerator::Deaerator(const double deaeratorPressure, const double ventRate, const double feedwaterMassFlow,
13  const double waterPressure, const SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity waterQuantityType,
14  const double waterQuantityValue, const double steamPressure,
15  const SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity steamQuantityType, const double steamQuantityValue)
16  : deaeratorPressure(deaeratorPressure), ventRate(ventRate), feedwaterMassFlow(feedwaterMassFlow),
17  waterPressure(waterPressure), waterQuantityValue(waterQuantityValue), steamPressure(steamPressure),
18  steamQuantityValue(steamQuantityValue), waterQuantityType(waterQuantityType),
19  steamQuantityType(steamQuantityType)
20 {
21  calculateProperties();
22 }
23 
24 void Deaerator::calculateProperties() {
25  auto const sp = SaturatedProperties(deaeratorPressure, SaturatedTemperature(deaeratorPressure).calculate()).calculate();
26  SteamSystemModelerTool::SteamPropertiesOutput steamProps = {sp.temperature, sp.pressure, 0, sp.liquidSpecificVolume,
27  1/sp.liquidSpecificVolume, sp.liquidSpecificEnthalpy,
28  sp.liquidSpecificEntropy};
29  feedwaterProperties = {feedwaterMassFlow, steamProps.specificEnthalpy * feedwaterMassFlow, steamProps};
30 
31  steamProps = {sp.temperature, sp.pressure, 1, sp.gasSpecificVolume, 1/sp.gasSpecificVolume, sp.gasSpecificEnthalpy,
32  sp.gasSpecificEntropy};
33  auto const ventedSteamMassFlow = (ventRate / 100) * feedwaterMassFlow;
34  ventedSteamProperties = {
35  ventedSteamMassFlow, steamProps.specificEnthalpy * ventedSteamMassFlow, steamProps
36  };
37 
38  auto inletWaterProps = SteamProperties(waterPressure, waterQuantityType, waterQuantityValue).calculate();
39  auto inletSteamProps = SteamProperties(steamPressure, steamQuantityType, steamQuantityValue).calculate();
40 
41  auto const totalDAMassFlow = ventedSteamMassFlow + feedwaterMassFlow;
42  auto const totalOutletEnergyFlow = (feedwaterProperties.specificEnthalpy * feedwaterMassFlow
43  + ventedSteamProperties.specificEnthalpy * ventedSteamMassFlow);
44  auto const minEnergyFlow = inletWaterProps.specificEnthalpy * totalDAMassFlow;
45  auto const neededEnergyFlow = totalOutletEnergyFlow - minEnergyFlow;
46  auto const inletSteamMassFlow = neededEnergyFlow / (inletSteamProps.specificEnthalpy
47  - inletWaterProps.specificEnthalpy);
48 
49  auto const inletWaterMassFlow = totalDAMassFlow - inletSteamMassFlow;
50  auto const inletSteamEnergyFlow = inletSteamProps.specificEnthalpy * inletSteamMassFlow;
51  auto const inletWaterEnergyFlow = inletWaterProps.specificEnthalpy * inletWaterMassFlow;
52 
53  inletWaterProperties = {
54  inletWaterMassFlow, inletWaterEnergyFlow, inletWaterProps
55  };
56 
57  inletSteamProperties = {
58  inletSteamMassFlow, inletSteamEnergyFlow, inletSteamProps
59  };
60 }
61 
62 double Deaerator::getDeaeratorPressure() const { return deaeratorPressure; }
63 double Deaerator::getVentRate() const { return ventRate; }
64 double Deaerator::getFeedwaterMassFlow() const { return feedwaterMassFlow; }
65 double Deaerator::getWaterPressure() const { return waterPressure; }
66 double Deaerator::getWaterQuantityValue() const { return waterQuantityValue; }
67 double Deaerator::getSteamPressure() const { return steamPressure; }
68 double Deaerator::getSteamQuantityValue() const { return steamQuantityValue; }
69 SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity Deaerator::getWaterQuantityType() const { return waterQuantityType; }
70 SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity Deaerator::getSteamQuantityType() const { return steamQuantityType; }
71 
72 void Deaerator::setDeaeratorPressure(double deaeratorPressure) {
73  this->deaeratorPressure = deaeratorPressure;
74  calculateProperties();
75 }
